Title: The Kids Are Alright (1)
Plot: Dawson returns to Boston after working as an assistant director in Los Angeles over the summer and reunites with Joey who has spent a relatively angst-free summer in Capeside. Audrey and Pacey return from L.A. with a surprise passenger, Audrey's childhood friend Jack Osborne.
GuestStars: Jack Osbourne, Ann Lincoln, Sean Dennison, Jeffery West, Zach Hanner, Brian LaFontaine
